Reconcile.definition: to restore to harmony [ reconciled the parties] [ reconciled the marriage] b

1 a.definition: to restore to harmony [the parties] [the marriage]

2 a.definition: to check (a financial account) against another for accuracy

sub_terms.b: to account forto become reconciledto voluntarily resume cohabitation as spouses prior to a divorce becoming final with the mutual intention of remaining together and reestablishing a harmonious relationship [denied the complaint for divorce because the parties had]
